name: The Creature of Black Fire
text: Target 1 "Red-Eyes" Dragon monster you control; this turn, that face-up monster is unaffected by card effects, except its own, also it cannot be destroyed by battle and any monster that battles it is destroyed at the end of the Damage Step. If you Normal or Special Summon a "Red-Eyes Black Dragon" while this card is in your GY: You can Set this card, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use this effect of "The Creature of Black Fire" once per turn.
